named-native-query.name: DtDataForDetail.findDtCellDetailById
named-native-query.query: SELECT d.EARFCN, d.ID, d.META_TIME, d.PCI, d.RSRP, d.RS_SINR, d.SCELL_DIST, d.LONGITUDE, d.LATITUDE, c.CELL_NAME, de.AREA_TYPE FROM RNO_LTE_DT_DATA d, RNO_LTE_CELL c, RNO_LTE_DT_DESC de WHERE d.SCELL_ID= c.CELL_ID AND de.ID = d.DESC_ID AND d.id=?1

named-native-query.name: DtNcellForDetail.findDtNCellDetailById
named-native-query.query: SELECT n.ID, n.RSRP AS ncell_rsrp, c.CELL_NAME AS ncell_name FROM RNO_LTE_DT_NCELL n, RNO_LTE_CELL c WHERE n.NCELL_ID = c.CELL_ID AND n.data_id=?1

named-native-query.name: DtNcell.findByDataIdInOrderByDataIdAsc
named-native-query.query: SELECT n.* FROM RNO_LTE_DT_NCELL n, RNO_LTE_DT_DATA d WHERE d.ID = n.DATA_ID AND d.DESC_ID= ?1 ORDER BY n.DATA_ID ASC
